channel.title: Rfcs on Open RFC for BIM
channel.description: Recent content in Rfcs on Open RFC for BIM

item.description: Definining Section To define a section: # NAME OF SECTION --- Text Styling Italic Bold Bold Italic The world is flat. We now know that the world is round. Number List first nested-1 nested-2 second third Bullet Point Unsorted list nested list-1 nested list-2 bullet Inserting Table Syntax Description Header Title Paragraph Text Inserting Link You can put link like this: link here. Inserting Code { "firstName": "John", "lastName": "Smith", "age": 25 }

item.title: RFC Process
item.description: A general guideline for wiring up new RFC and also sets the process from initiatination to the acceptance of a new RFC on the platform as well as its lifecycle.

item.title: RFC template
item.description: This is a minimum tempalte for all new RFCs, duplicate this markdown file (.md) to start writing up your RFC!
